Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    The Deck class is used to handle a set of cards that will be either operators or numbers.

    Deck

    Date: 2016/05/24

    Version:
    1 2016/05/24
    Author:
    David White and Sepehr Hosseini

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck(java.lang.String deckName)
      This constructor creates a Deck which contains a set of Cards that are either numbers or operators.

      • deckFromFile

        public static Deck deckFromFile(java.lang.String fileName)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        This method is used to read a Deck from a file.

        Local variables:

        s This variable is used as reference to the Scanner class.

        numCards The number of Cards in the Deck in the file.

        deck The Deck that will be created from the file.

        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the file that contains the Deck.
        Returns:
        Deck the Deck that is read from the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when there is a problem reading from a file.

      • deckToFile

        public void deckToFile(java.lang.String fileName)
                throws java.io.IOException
        This method is used to write a Deck to a file.

        Local variables:

        out This variable is used as reference to the PrintWriter class used to write to a file.

        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the file that this method will write to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when there is a problem writing to the file.

      • dealOperators

        public Card[] dealOperators(int numCards)
        This method is used to deal a specified number of Cards that are operators.

        Local variables:

        hand The random Cards that will be dealt in the player's hand from the Deck.

        rand A random number that will be used to randomly choose an index from the Deck for the player's hand.

        Parameters:
        numCards - the number of Cards that will be dealt.
        Returns:
        Card[] the array of Cards to be dealt that are operators.

      • dealNumbers

        public Card[] dealNumbers(int numCards)
        This method is used to deal a specified number of Cards that are numbers.

        Local variables:

        hand The random Cards that will be dealt in the player's hand from the Deck.

        rand A random number that will be used to randomly choose an index from the Deck for the player's hand.

        Parameters:
        numCards - the number of Cards that will be dealt.
        Returns:
        Card[] the array of Cards to be dealt that are numbers.

        Parameters:
